robotics.title: Robotics – Autonomous Systems with Firewall Protection
robotics.subtitle: From single robots to coordinated fleets: safe planning, perception and execution – with policies, Shadow→Enforce rollout and auditable decisions.
robotics.overview: Robotics requires safety from the first frame: We combine perception, planning and control with an end‑to‑end Neural Firewall. Shadow→Enforce enables risk‑free rollout while policies and audit logs make every action traceable.

sensorfusion.title: Real‑time Sensor Fusion
sensorfusion.desc: Fusion of camera, lidar, IMU and telemetry – robust perception even in dynamic environments.

planning.title: Planning & Execution
planning.desc: From high‑level tasks to safe, verifiable trajectories. Policies prevent dangerous actions.

multiagent.title: Multi‑Agent Coordination
multiagent.desc: Orchestrated teams with roles, communication and conflict resolution – scalable and resilient.

firewall.title: Neural Firewall Protection
firewall.desc: Pre/post filtering for sensor data, commands and effectors. Shadow→Enforce enables safe commissioning.

twins.title: Digital Twins & Simulation
twins.desc: Validate policies and paths in simulation – before real systems are affected.

safety.title: Safety & Compliance
safety.desc: Traceable decisions, RBAC and audit logs – compatible with industrial safety standards.

safety.title: Safety & Governance
safety.policiesDesc: Constraint‑based rules for zones, speeds, interactions and e‑stops – per robot and fleet.
safety.auditDesc: Every decision is versioned and traceable – perfect for certification and incident response.

cta.title: Request a demo: Robotics with Firewall
cta.desc: Experience safe autonomy – from simulation to fleet operations.

appstore.title: Extensions & Integrations – curated, secure, ready to use
appstore.subtitle: Install vetted apps and pipelines in minutes: versioned, with transparent permissions and fully compatible with the Neural Firewall (Shadow→Enforce).
appstore.overview: Install curated extensions and ready‑made pipelines in minutes – with transparent permissions, versioning, reviews and full compatibility with the Neural Firewall (Shadow→Enforce).

curated.title: Curated Apps
curated.desc: From compliance kits to research pipelines – vetted quality, clear changelogs and support.

integrations.title: 100+ Integrations
integrations.desc: Connect data stores, APIs and tools. Secure via RBAC and granular scopes.

pipelines.title: Templates & Pipelines
pipelines.desc: Deploy‑ready workflows with versioning, rollbacks and cost controls.

reviews.title: Security Reviews
reviews.desc: Every app is reviewed for policies, permissions and audit transparency.

install.title: 1‑Click Install
install.desc: Test in shadow mode, then enforce – no downtime, full audit trail.

licensing.title: Flexible Licensing
licensing.desc: Free, Pro or Enterprise add‑ons – centrally managed, transparently billed.

publishing.title: Publishing & Reviews
publishing.submissionDesc: Submit apps with clear scopes, changelogs and SemVer. Automated checks for policies and security.
publishing.verifyDesc: Signed artifacts, verifiable integrity and audit trails. Rollouts in shadow mode, then enforce.

cta.title: Submit an app or propose an integration
cta.desc: Join the ecosystem: secure, curated apps – compatible with the Neural Firewall.

firewallIntro.title: Firewall-Powered AI Agents
firewallIntro.description: The most secure AI agents: Pre/post filtering via SIGMAGUARD (powered by Superagent), routing & rate-limits via Kong API Gateway, orchestration with SIGMACODE AI (Multi-Agent Systems), complete audit logs and under 100ms additional latency.
